ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
//java.log(page=String(java.getString('.chapterPages@a.-1@html')))
page=String(java.getString('.chapterPages@a.-1@html')).match(/\/(\d+)\/(\d+)\_(\d+)\.html/)
if(page){
	let burl=source.key;
	pageSum=parseInt(page[3])
	result=Array.from({length:pageSum-1},
(_,i)=>`${burl}${page[1]}/${page[2]}_${i+2}.html`)
 result;
	}else{null}
</js>
